text: Valentino Ravnić (born 20 July 1995) is a Croatian handball player for RK Zagreb and the Croatian national team.EHF profile He represented Croatia at the 2020 European Men's Handball Championship.2020 European Men's Handball Championship squad ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Zadar Category:Croatian male handball players Category:RK Zagreb players
title: Valentino Ravnić
